title: Flexible Learning Design for Orchestrating Collaborative Learning Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Designed for pre-service and in-service teachers, conducted in smartphone-based limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners explain the interoperability principles of various digital tools (e.g., forums, pedagogical agents) that support collaborative learning activities.
Learners implement the role of a mediator component (managing data flow between tools) in a simulated environment.
Learners execute flexible collaborative learning scenarios in mobile environments through IMS-LD-based activity design.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
